name: ½ HP AC Chain Drive Wi-Fi® Garage Door Opener with Integrated Bluetooth® Technology
description: The LiftMaster 81650 is a durable 1/2 HP AC chain drive garage door opener featuring integrated Wi-Fi and Bluetooth for seamless connectivity. It offers reliable performance, smart control via the myQ app, and enhanced security features for industrial-strength operation.
shortDescription: 1/2 HP AC chain drive opener with Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and myQ integration for steady, smart garage control.
features: AC Motor: Purposefully designed and built to last
myQ® Connected: Control, secure, and monitor the garage from the myQ app anytime, from anywhere
Secure in-garage delivery: Enables Amazon Key In-Garage Delivery (free for Prime members)
Security+ 2.0®: Sends a new code with every remote click
Invisible light beam safety system with auto-reverse
PosiLock® electronic protection against forced openings
Integrated Bluetooth technology: Reduces setup time and easier connection to myQ app and smart home devices
Chain drive system: For steady performance and industrial strength
myQ Diagnostics: Real-time health reports and alerts for garage door issues

specifications.motor: 1/2 HP AC, 1,625 RPM, automatic thermal protection, permanent lubrication
specifications.mechanics: Steel chassis, T-rail and trolley, full chain drive (16:1 gear reduction), auto-force adjustment, electronic limits, AC Wi-Fi logic board with built-in surge suppressor
specifications.power: 120V AC, 60 Hz, 6A current rating, UL Listed
specifications.lighting: Max. 1 x 100-watt lightbulb; Enhanced CFL compatible, max. 26 watts

inTheBox: The Protector System® Safety Reversing Sensors
